scoring_scale.direction: higher = worse / more narrative risk / more biased

npoV_deviation.1: Strongly neutral; multiple perspectives clearly separated and contextualized
npoV_deviation.2: Mostly neutral; minor framing or emphasis issues
npoV_deviation.3: Mixed; noticeable narrative tilt or selective framing
npoV_deviation.4: Clear deviation; one interpretive frame dominates
npoV_deviation.5: Severe deviation; article effectively argues a position

emotive_language.4: Heavy emotional or moral framing throughout
emotive_language.5: Pervasive emotive language shaping reader judgment

certainty_inflation.3: Mixed handling of certainty and dispute
certainty_inflation.5: Strong claims presented as unquestionable fact

attribution_balance.3: Noticeable imbalance in who is quoted or framed
attribution_balance.5: One-sided attribution; others marginalized or delegitimized

dehumanization_cues.2: Rare, mild, or carefully attributed instances
dehumanization_cues.3: Repeated cues or morally absolutist phrasing
dehumanization_cues.5: Pervasive framing that denies legitimacy or humanity
